DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Japan. The aim of this study is to evaluate the incidence of severe hypoglycaemia episodes under normal clinical practice for patients with type 1 or type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Special Survey for Type 1 or Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients with diabetes requiring insulin therapy Patients who had not been treated more than 3 months at the same investigational site Patients who had treatment history of NovoRapidÂ® (insulin aspart)
